issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Implement Postgres String Functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11298](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11298). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a general task to add the Postgres String Functions to DataFusion.

https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/functions-string.html

comments.body:
